item.title: Estafette extensions
item.description: extensions/git-clone git-clone: image: extensions/git-clone:stable shallow: '< boolean | true >' The git-clone stage is automatically injected if not present in your manifest for the build stages; in the release stages it's not injected. In case you don't need anything from your repository to release this speeds things up. The shallow clone - enabled by default - checks out the latest 50 commits for the particular branch, then selects the correct revision.
